name: CLKComplicationTimelineEntry
desc: A container for the complication template object to display and the time to display it.

items.name: init(date: Date, complicationTemplate: CLKComplicationTemplate)
items.desc: Creates and returns a timeline entry with the specified date and complication data.

items.name: init(date: Date, complicationTemplate: CLKComplicationTemplate, timelineAnimationGroup: String?)
items.desc: Creates and returns a timeline entry with the specified information.

items.name: var date: Date
items.desc: The time at which to display the entry.

items.name: var complicationTemplate: CLKComplicationTemplate
items.desc: The template containing the data to display in your complication.

items.name: var timelineAnimationGroup: String?
items.desc: The animation group to which the entry belongs.
